Package pkgMain

Class GardenScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.GardenScreen
public class GardenScreen
extends java.lang.Object
The Garden Screen Class

This class handles all actions that take place on the Garden screen, including the initialization of the Garden Layout pane

Author:
Zack Luan, Matthew Weis, Ben Newlin, Mayson Light, Bryan Paliska

  • Constructor Details

    • GardenScreen

      public GardenScreen​(double canvasWidth1, double canvasHeight1)
      Class Constructor
      Parameters:
      canvasWidth1 - width of the Garden
      canvasHeight1 - height of the Garden

  • Method Details

    • Initial

      public void Initial​(java.util.ArrayList<pkgMain.Plant> plants, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> plantPictureNames, int budget, java.lang.String sunValue, java.lang.String soilValue, java.lang.String moistureValue, javafx.scene.layout.Pane garden, double Width, double Height, int lepCount, int cost, double longerInFeet, double shorterInFeet)
      Initializes the Garden Screen
      Parameters:
      plants - the ArrayList of Plants meeting the Sun, Soil, and Moisture Conditions
      plantPictureNames - the ArrayList of Strings of the Plant names meeting garden conditions
      budget - the budget for the Garden
      sunValue - the Set Sun Value
      soilValue - the Set Soil Value
      moistureValue - the Set Moisture Value
      garden - the Garden Pane initialized from the Format Screen
      Width - the Width of the Garden
      Height - the Height of the Garden
      lepCount - the initial lep count when entering the garden screen
      cost - the total cost of the garden occured so far
      longerInFeet - the Length of the Garden in feet
      shorterInFeet - the Width of the Garden in feet

    • ChangeBandL

      public void ChangeBandL​(int ChangeofBudget, int ChangeOfLeps, boolean clear, int originalB)
      Changes the Parameters of Budget and LepCount on Garden Screen when a plant is added
      Parameters:
      ChangeofBudget - the budget of the added plant
      ChangeOfLeps - the number of leps supported by the new plant
      clear - boolean that makes sure clear button has or has not been pressed (true if not pressed)
      originalB - the original budget passed into the Garden Screen

    • ChangeGarden

      public void ChangeGarden​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane garden, double W, double H, int originalBudget)
      Clears the garden and resets it's parameters to it's original values
      Parameters:
      garden - the initial garden pane passed into Garden Screen
      W - the width of the Garden
      H - the length of the Garden
      originalBudget - the original budget passed in to the Garden Screen
